description: Non-material amendment to planning permission PP/24/01206 (Alterations to front garden landscaping to provide improved amenity space. Alterations to front lightwell ensure access to daylight at lower ground floor level without adverse impact to materiality or massing of front garden. Addition of two air conditioning condensers housed within acoustic enclosure to intersection of butterfly roof.) for lowering of existing/retained concrete sill to lower ground floor lightwell's sash window, structural opening (height only) modified to accommodate larger, high-quality replacement sash window while maintaining existing brick arch detail in position.
